title: Random ping spike recently
body: Hey I live in Canada Manitoba and ive recently noticed that my ping has went from 29 to 80-100 any reason why this is happening? It's not my internet cause I get perfect ping in other games its only on league and I have some friends who are experiencing the same issue.

replies.body:
We've seen a recent influx of players reporting issues with certain ISP's and as a result, increased latency (ping). I strongly recommend running a traceroute so we can take an in-depth look at your route to the server. You can accomplish this by grabbing [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/), then plugging in **104.160.131.1** into the host address area before starting the trace. After it has run for roughly 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them in a reply.

Let me know if you encounter any issues doing this.
